resources.string: Select a new period start date?
CLICK THE CALENDER AND SELECT THE DATE THE LAST PERIOD BEGAN
Choose a cycle day amount between 24 and 34
Select A Date From The Calender
Please Select A Past Date From The Calender
That Date Is Out Of Possible Ranges!
ESTIMATED START DATE OF THE NEXT PERIOD:
IF THE LATEST PERIOD HAS COME CLICK THE CALENDER AND SELECT THE DATE IT BEGAN
Condoms are your friend. Your lady is midcycle which means she is probably ovulating right about now. If you don not want kiddos wrap it up.

Compliments make the world go round. She is starting to feel crabby, her skin is breaking out, and you are annoying her just by breathing. Do not forget to give her compliments even if she is being a bitch.
Flowers or sweets. She does not feel good today. She is bloated, cranky, and likely has a headache. A little treat might mean the difference between tears or smiles.
Bring home dinner. She does not want to cook, she does not want to clean up after dinner. Pick up her favorite takeout and rub her back after dinner.
Next one has passed and should have been:
Go to the previous screen and select the day that the period began!
That Time Of The Month Notification
